# Name: # There is also a new "otadata" slot
Type: which holds the data for OTA updates. The bootloader consults this data in order to know which app to execute. If "ota data" is empty
SubType: it will execute the factory app.

# Name: # The "Offset" field for each partition is empty. The gen_esp32part.py tool fills in each blank offset
Type: starting after the partition table and making sure each partition is aligned correctly.
